info.readme:
uSync (Beta Patch) for Umbraco 7 =============================================
* this is a sticking plaster release for umbraco 7.x *
it works-ish but a much better and more stable release is coming, once some internal bugfixes have landed inside umbraco (probibly v7.1) in the meantime this is an update of the RC3 release of usync for umbraco 7 - it sort of works.
uSync is a umbraco DB to/from disk syncing tool.
uSync will write out the following to disk : - DocumentTypes, - Macros, - DataTypes, - Dictionary Items, - Languages, - Templates - Stylesheets
you can then source control them
uSync will also read the same files at startup and add them to umbraco.
uSync is designed to aid the sycronization and source control of umbraco installations, it needs to be used in conjunction with other tools as part of a calorie controlled installation.
